title: "Boosted"
body: So i was just called a "Boosted Animal" cuz i wasnt having the best of games, what does "Boosted" mean?

replies.body: it refers to a higher elo player, suggesting that the player has been elo boosted(payed to get to that rank) for making a simple mistake.

Considering your unranked, it really means nothing except whoever called you that is brain dead, but in a general sense it is said to people who are ranked higher then they should be because someone has played on their account to get them a higher ELO
